alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Dixie; Franklin; Gadsden; Gulf; Jackson; Jefferson; Lafayette; Leon; Liberty; Madison; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Watch issued April 27 at 4:51PM EDT until April 27 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WATCH 174 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 7 PM EDT /6 PM CDT/ THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA DIXIE FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LAFAYETTE LEON LIBERTY MADISON TAYLOR WAKULLA IN PANHANDLE FLORIDA CALHOUN GULF JACKSON IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA BROOKS LOWNDES THOMAS IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA DECATUR GRADY SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ABE SPRINGS, ADAMS BEACH, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ATHENA, AUSMAC, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BLOUNTSTOWN, BLUE SPRINGS, BLUE SPRINGS, BOYD, BRADFORDVILLE, BROOKS CO A/P, BROWNTOWN, BUCELL JUNCTION, BUCK SIDING, BUCKVILLE, CABBAGE GROVE, CAIRO, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARBUR, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHERRY LAKE, CLARKSVILLE, COOKS HAMMOCK, CROSS CITY, CROSS CITY AIRPORT, DALKEITH, DAVIS PARK, DAY, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DILLS, DIXIE, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DRIFTON, DURHAM, ELPINO, EMPRESS, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FORT GADSDEN, FRINK, GRACEVILLE, GRADY CO A/P, GROOVERVILLE, HANOVER, HANSON, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HILLIARDVILLE, HINES, HONEYVILLE, HOPEWELL, HOWARD CREEK, JARROTT, JONESBORO, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOVETT, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MADISON, MALONE, MARIANNA, MARYSVILLE, MAYO, METCALF, MIDWAY, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, NANKIN, OAK GROVE, ODENA, OLD TOWN, PASCO, PERRY, PINE PARK, PINETTA, PORT ST. JOE, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, QUITMAN, RICHTER CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SCOTTS FERRY, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SIMSVILLE, SNEADS, SOPCHOPPY, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SWEETWATER, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TILTON, VALDOSTA, VALDOSTA REGIONAL AIRPORT, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, WEWAHITCHKA, WHITE CITY, AND YELLOW JACKET.
